name: audio_to_midi
description: Transcribe audio to MIDI notes. Detects pitched content and outputs a MIDI file. Works best on monophonic sources (vocals, bass, lead instruments).

min_note_length_ms.description: Minimum note length in milliseconds (default: 50). Shorter = more notes detected.

onset_threshold.description: Onset detection sensitivity 0.0-1.0 (default: 0.3). Lower = more sensitive.
